about_the_game:
RedEyes 赤瞳之勋 DLC SV battle monsters footage requires a RedEyes 赤瞳之勋 game to download


The plug-in YEP_X_AnimatedSVEnemies that installs yanfly can be used as an enemy


It can also be used as a role SV diagram


The original SV battle monster material, the dynamic monster battle picture material with the supporting walking picture and so on


You can then use the YEP_X_ActSeqPack series plugins to create rich, vivid and gorgeous combat skills


This material contains 7 types of monsters and more than 4 colors


This material dynamic monster map contains more than 3 attack actions and other actions


Some monsters have faces


This material will be updated continuously. Thanks for your support!

The copyright of this DLC belongs to the author. The material can be used in various RPG games or games made by game engines. The material can be commercially modified but not sold twice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 4 GHz dual core or 8 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 4GB memory recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 16 MB available space

short_description: RedEyes 赤瞳之勋 DLC SV battle monsters footage requires a RedEyes 赤瞳之勋 game to download RedEyes SV battle monster material of big red eye series, the dynamic monster battle picture material with the matching walking picture, can make rich and vivid and magnificent fighting skills, what are you waiting for!
